reports.title: Report Management
reports.subtitle: Review and take action on reported content and users

details.title: Investigation Details
details.selectReport: Select a report to view details

actions.title: Moderation Actions
actions.helper: Choose an action to take on this report

dismiss.title: Dismiss Report
dismiss.description: This will mark the report as dismissed. No action will be taken on the reported content or user.

remove.title: Remove Content Only
remove.description: This will remove the reported content only. The user will not be banned.

ban.title: Ban User Only
ban.description: This will ban the user who created the content. The content will remain visible.

both.title: Ban User & Remove Content
both.description: This will ban the user AND remove the reported content. Both actions will be applied.

adminNote.label: Admin Note (Optional)
adminNote.placeholder: Add a note about this action...

success.both: User has been banned and content removed successfully

error.default: Failed to resolve report. Please try again.
error.spam: This content has been reported as spam. Please review and take appropriate action.
error.fake: This content has been reported as containing fake information. Please verify and take action.
error.offensive: This content has been reported as offensive. Please review the content carefully.
error.harassment: This content has been reported for harassment. This is a serious violation.
error.misinformation: This content has been reported as misinformation. Please verify the facts.

empty.title: No reports found
empty.description: There are no reports matching your current filters.

about.title: About Ethica Jobs
about.subtitle: Connecting job seekers with ethical employers who share their values

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Ethica Jobs is dedicated to transforming the job market by connecting job seekers with employers who prioritize ethical practices, social responsibility, and positive workplace cultures. We believe that everyone deserves to work for organizations that align with their personal values and contribute meaningfully to society.
mission.content2: Our platform goes beyond traditional job boards by highlighting employers committed to diversity and inclusion, environmental sustainability, fair labor practices, and community engagement. We empower job seekers to make informed decisions about where they invest their time and talent.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.content: We provide clear, accurate information about employers, including their ethical commitments, workplace practices, and community impact. Job seekers deserve honesty about the companies they consider joining.

inclusion.title: Inclusion & Diversity
inclusion.content: We celebrate and promote workplaces that embrace diversity in all its forms. We believe that inclusive teams are stronger, more innovative, and better equipped to solve complex challenges.

fairness.title: Fair Labor Practices
fairness.content: We support employers who offer fair wages, safe working conditions, opportunities for professional growth, and respect for workers' rights. Everyone deserves dignity in the workplace.

community.title: Community Impact
community.content: We highlight organizations that give back to their communities, support local initiatives, and create positive social change. We believe businesses have a responsibility to contribute to the common good.

offer.title: What We Offer
offer.jobs: Curated job listings from employers verified for their ethical practices and commitments
offer.workplaces: Detailed workplace profiles showcasing company values, culture, and ethical initiatives
offer.mentorship: Mentorship opportunities connecting job seekers with experienced professionals in their field
offer.community: A supportive community forum for discussing career development, workplace ethics, and industry trends
offer.volunteering: Volunteering opportunities with nonprofit organizations making a difference in their communities

about.closing: Join us in building a job market where values matter. Together, we can create workplaces that not only succeed economically but also contribute to a better world.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.intro: At Ethica Jobs, we're committed to providing the best possible experience for job seekers and employers alike. Whether you have questions, feedback, or need assistance, we're here to help. Your input helps us improve our platform and better serve our community.

general.title: General Inquiries
general.description: For general questions about our platform, features, or how to get started:

support.title: Technical Support
support.description: Need help with your account, password reset, or technical issues?

feedback.title: Feedback & Suggestions
feedback.description: Share your ideas, suggestions, or feedback to help us improve:

bug.title: Report a Bug
bug.description: Found a bug or experiencing issues? Please let us know:

partnerships.title: Employer Partnerships
partnerships.content: Are you an employer committed to ethical practices and looking to connect with values-driven job seekers? We'd love to partner with you. Please reach out to discuss how we can help showcase your organization's commitment to ethics and attract talented individuals who share your values.

contact.response: We typically respond to all inquiries within 1-2 business days. Thank you for your patience and for being part of the Ethica Jobs community!

intro.title: Our Commitment to Privacy
intro.content: At Ethica Jobs, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform. We are committed to protecting your personal data and being transparent about our practices.
intro.content2: By using Ethica Jobs, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We will only use your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy and in ways that are consistent with our ethical values.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.content: When you create an account or use our services, we may collect:
personal.name: Name, email address, and contact information
personal.profile: Profile information, including work experience, education, and skills

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.content: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our platform, including pages visited, searches performed, and features used. This helps us improve our services and user experience.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.service: To provide, maintain, and improve our job board and related services
use.communication: To communicate with you about your account, applications, and important platform updates
use.matching: To match job seekers with relevant opportunities based on skills and preferences
use.analytics: To analyze usage patterns and enhance the user experience
use.security: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues, security threats, or fraudulent activity

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
security.content2: We use industry-standard encryption, secure authentication practices, and regular security audits to safeguard your data. We also limit access to personal information to employees, contractors, and service providers who need it to perform their duties.

rights.title: Your Privacy Rights
rights.access: Access and review your personal information
rights.delete: Request deletion of your account and personal data
rights.export: Export your data in a portable format
rights.optout: Opt-out of certain communications and data processing activities

contact.intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please contact us at:

intro.title: Agreement to Terms
intro.content: Welcome to Ethica Jobs. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our platform, including our website, mobile applications, and related services (collectively, the "Service"). By accessing or using Ethica Jobs, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
intro.content2: If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our Service. We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time, and such modifications will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of the Service after changes are posted constitutes your acceptance of the modified Terms.

accuracy.title: Accurate Information
accuracy.content: You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information when creating an account or using our Service. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

conduct.title: Acceptable Use
conduct.spam: Post false, misleading, or fraudulent information
conduct.harassment: Harass, threaten, or discriminate against other users
conduct.illegal: Use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
conduct.violate: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
conduct.abuse: Interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers

jobs.title: Job Listings and Applications
jobs.content: Ethica Jobs serves as a platform connecting job seekers with employers. We do not guarantee employment, and we are not responsible for the hiring decisions made by employers. Job seekers are responsible for verifying the legitimacy of job postings and employers before applying.
jobs.content2: Employers are responsible for ensuring their job postings are accurate, comply with applicable employment laws, and reflect their genuine commitment to ethical practices. We reserve the right to remove any job posting or employer profile that violates our standards or these Terms.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Ethica Jobs and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works from our Service without our prior written consent.
ip.content2: You retain ownership of any content you post on our platform, but by posting content, you grant Ethica Jobs a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute your content in connection with operating and promoting our Service.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free, or that defects will be corrected.
disclaimer.content2: We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any job listings, employer profiles, or user-generated content. You use the Service at your own risk.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Ethica Jobs shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses resulting from your use of the Service.

ethical.title: Our Commitment to Ethical Practices
ethical.content: As a platform dedicated to connecting job seekers with ethical employers, we hold ourselves to high standards. We are committed to fair treatment of all users, transparency in our practices, and promoting diversity, inclusion, and social responsibility.
ethical.content2: We expect all users—both job seekers and employers—to share this commitment to ethical conduct. Violations of these principles may result in account suspension or termination.

contact.intro: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
